# AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET COMMITTEE ON ARMED SERVICES
## `dd63235dae610c6706b63b4411b2bbf6`
`Mr. DODD â€” 7 June 2007`

---


Mr. DODD. Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee 
on Armed Services be authorized to meet during the session of the 
Senate on Thursday, June 7, 2007, at 9:30 a.m., in open session to 
consider the nomination of Lieutenant General Douglas E. Lute, USA, to 
be assistant to the President and Deputy National Security Advisor for 
Iraq and Afghanistan.
